entry.title: Colby
entry.content: The [Switch~ Ensemble] is ensemble-in-residence at Colby College in Waterville, Maine, for performances of works by Assistant Professor José Martínez and more.
entry.summary: The [Switch~ Ensemble] is ensemble-in-residence at Colby College in Waterville, Maine, for performances of works by Assistant Professor José Martínez and more.

entry.title: Nyc
entry.content: The [Switch~ Ensemble] gives the New York City premiere of a five brand new commissions from Kelley Sheehan, Forbes Graham, Leilihua Lanzilotti, Santiago Diez-Fischer, and Anna-Louise Walton.
entry.summary: The [Switch~ Ensemble] gives the New York City premiere of a five brand new commissions from Kelley Sheehan, Forbes Graham, Leilihua Lanzilotti, Santiago Diez-Fischer, and Anna-Louise Walton.

entry.title: ICIT 2021
entry.content: Dec. 13-19, 2021, Bangkok: International Composition Institute of Thailand (ICIT) Faculty Artist. More at https://www.tmaomusic.com/icit2021
entry.summary: Dec. 13-19, 2021, Bangkok: International Composition Institute of Thailand (ICIT) Faculty Artist. More at https://www.tmaomusic.com/icit2021

entry.title: Sinuston
entry.content: In our European return to in-person performances, the [Switch~ Ensemble] gives the world premiere of Leilehua Lanzilotti’s Born is the Rain, the German premiere Katharina Rosenberger’s Up Close and Jason Thorpe Buchanan’s “soliloquios del viento”, and works by Ted Moore and Igor C. Silva.
entry.summary: In our European return to in-person performances, the [Switch~ Ensemble] gives the world premiere of Leilehua Lanzilotti’s Born is the Rain, the German premiere Katharina Rosenberger’s Up Close and Jason Thorpe Buchanan’s “soliloquios del viento”, and works by Ted Moore and Igor C. Silva.

entry.title: Dimenna
entry.content: In our return to in-person performances, the [Switch~ Ensemble] gives the New York City premiere of a new work we have commissioned from Swiss composer Katharina Rosenberger and the American Premiere of Jason Thorpe Buchanan’s soliloquios del viento.
entry.summary: In our return to in-person performances, the [Switch~ Ensemble] gives the New York City premiere of a new work we have commissioned from Swiss composer Katharina Rosenberger and the American Premiere of Jason Thorpe Buchanan’s soliloquios del viento.

entry.title: Reflexive Iterations 1.a (2020) score for ensemble and no-input mixer now available. Video coming soon!

link.title: Reflexive Iterations 1.a (2020) score for ensemble and no-input mixer now available. Video coming soon!

entry.content: “May 7, 2021: The score for Reflexive Iterations 1.a (2020), written for the TACETi Ensemble for ensemble and no-input mixer, is now available. Audio and Video from the December premiere in Bangkok is currently being edited and will be released in the coming weeks.”
entry.summary: “May 7, 2021: The score for Reflexive Iterations 1.a (2020), written for the TACETi Ensemble for ensemble and no-input mixer, is now available. Audio and Video from the December premiere in Bangkok is currently being edited and will be released in the coming weeks.”

entry.title: The socially distanced version of all-forgetting-is-retrieval (2019) for ensemble and augmented conductor has been released, performed by Less Than 10 Ensemble

link.title: The socially distanced version of all-forgetting-is-retrieval (2019) for ensemble and augmented conductor has been released, performed by Less Than 10 Ensemble

entry.content: “May. 7, 2019: The video of the socially distanced version of all-forgetting-is-retrieval (2019) for ensemble and augmented conductor, performed by Less Than 10 Ensemble, is now available.”
entry.summary: “May. 7, 2019: The video of the socially distanced version of all-forgetting-is-retrieval (2019) for ensemble and augmented conductor, performed by Less Than 10 Ensemble, is now available.”

entry.title: Mizzou
entry.content: The [Switch~ Ensemble] premieres new works by Luis Bezerra, Oswald Huynh, and Santiago Beis during our University of Missouri 2021 Virtual Residency, with performances of recent works by Chris Chandler and Zachary James Watkins.
entry.summary: The [Switch~ Ensemble] premieres new works by Luis Bezerra, Oswald Huynh, and Santiago Beis during our University of Missouri 2021 Virtual Residency, with performances of recent works by Chris Chandler and Zachary James Watkins.

entry.title: Seamus
entry.content: The [Switch~ Ensemble] premieres new works by Christopher Chandler and Ted Moore digitally during the SEAMUS 2021 Digital Conference, with performances of works by Anuj Bhutani, Eren Gumrukcuoglu, Annea Lockwood, and Zachary James Watkins.
entry.summary: The [Switch~ Ensemble] premieres new works by Christopher Chandler and Ted Moore digitally during the SEAMUS 2021 Digital Conference, with performances of works by Anuj Bhutani, Eren Gumrukcuoglu, Annea Lockwood, and Zachary James Watkins.

entry.title: Less Than 10
entry.content: Less Than <10 is a student run ensemble at the Butler School of Music, University of Texas at Austin.
entry.summary: Less Than <10 is a student run ensemble at the Butler School of Music, University of Texas at Austin.
